subject: p19404187
Findings: In comparison with study of, there has been removal of pleural fluid from the left hemithorax. No evidence of pneumothorax. Coalescent areas in the left upper and lower zones could well reflect regions of consolidation. The right lung is essentially clear. Right IJ central catheter extends to the lower portion of the SVC.
